languages.name: Android | Native
languages.desp: Native Android App will be our first love forever!

languages.name: React JS
languages.desp: Fast, responsive web-apps powered by Facebook’s ReactJS and NextJS.

languages.name: VueJS
languages.desp: SPAs, Sever-side rendered webpages. Speed and VueJS go hand in hand.

languages.name: NodeJS
languages.desp: Oh come-on! Everybody loves NodeJS (with only typescript).

languages.name: Javascript/ Typescript
languages.desp: Well JS and TS (❤) are the way to go. Ofcourse we love Typescript more!

languages.name: Kotlin
languages.desp: Kotlin is probably our first preference when it comes to anything. It is what is it…

languages.name: Golang
languages.desp: Golang is just fast. It’s our first choice when it comes to high performance servers.

languages.name: Firebase
languages.desp: A lot of apps today our powered by Google’s Firebase. We love it too here at Devriz!

languages.name: NuxtJS
languages.desp: Nuxt is a powerful framework. We haven't looked back since we started using it.
